snippet.title: Strike Team Gladius Trailer
snippet.description: Official trailer for Strike Team Gladius, a tactical, turn-based strategy game coming to Steam Early Access in late 2020.  Players take command of human forces in a campaign to retake a colony world from an alien invasion.  Take command of elite soldiers, heavy mechs, tanks and ground assault vehicles as you fight a ruthless enemy.
